mapper.insert: insert into tbl_books (B_CODE, B_NAME, B_AUTHER, B_COMP, B_YEAR, B_IPRICE, B_RPRICE) values(#{b_code}, #{b_name}, #{b_auther}, #{b_comp}, #{b_year}, #{b_iprice}, #{b_rprice})
mapper.select: create table IF NOT EXISTS tbl_books ( B_CODE VARCHAR(13) not null PRIMARY KEY, B_NAME VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, B_AUTHER VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, B_COMP VARCHAR(125), B_YEAR INT NOT NULL, B_IPRICE INT, B_RPRICE INT NOT NULL )
